sentences.en: "I absolutely hated school," Rachel says. "I skived off all the time."
sentences.cn: “我恨透了学校，”雷切尔说，“我总是逃学。”

sentences.en: At my brother's high school graduation the students recited a poem.
sentences.cn: 在我弟弟的高中毕业典礼上，学生们朗诵了一首诗。

sentences.en: Children at school receive coloured stars for work well done.
sentences.cn: 学校里的孩子表现得好会得到彩色星星。

sentences.en: He introduced radio to the school to increase the children's awareness.
sentences.cn: 他在学校开通广播，以提高孩子们的警觉性。

sentences.en: He was headmaster of a public school in the West of England.
sentences.cn: 他是英格兰西部一所公学的校长。

sentences.en: His mother always used to pick him up from school.
sentences.cn: 他母亲以前一直去学校接他。

sentences.en: In many ways, it was a very modern school for its time.
sentences.cn: 从很多方面来说，这所学校在当时是非常先进的。

sentences.en: Many school buildings are unsafe, and some are falling apart.
sentences.cn: 许多校舍不安全，有些简直是摇摇欲坠。

sentences.en: Mr Thomas was taught by the Catholic nuns whose school he attended.
sentences.cn: 托马斯先生是在天主教修女创办的学校接受的教育。

sentences.en: Of course, now she is away at boarding school.
sentences.cn: 当然，她现在住在寄宿学校那边。

sentences.en: The boy first showed promise as an athlete in grade school.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩在上小学的时候就初次显示出成为运动员的潜力。

sentences.en: The queue for places at the school has never been longer.
sentences.cn: 排队申请上这所学校的人数达到历史最高峰。

sentences.en: The school has won awards for its pioneering work with the community.
sentences.cn: 这所学校因其针对该社区具有开创性的工作而获奖。

sentences.en: there is a school of thought that says 1960s office blocks should be refurbished as residential accommodation.
sentences.cn: 有一种思潮认为60年代的办公街区应重新装修用作住宅。

sentences.en: This is happening in every school throughout the country.
sentences.cn: 全国各地每所学校都在发生这样的事情。

sentences.en: When they leave school, they will be equipped for obtaining office jobs.
sentences.cn: 离校时，他们将有能力获得办公室工作的机会。

sentences.en: With characteristic impetuosity, he announced he was leaving school.
sentences.cn: 一贯性急冲动的他又宣布要退学了。
